languages.text: {n}На лице Абеляра лежит тень, его голос тверд, однако в нем проскальзывают нотки сожаления.{/n} "Дворянское семейство и все его ветви обвиняется в ереси. Приказом Вольного Торговца весь род будет изничтожен. Исполнение приговора начать незамедлительно".

traits.locale_text: "Семейство Драйвстем во главе с Урбендом Драйвстемом обвиняется в ереси. Приказом Вольного Торговца весь род приговаривается к смерти. Приговор привести в исполнение немедленно".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}A shadow falls across Abelard's face. His tone is unwavering, but you hear the soft ring of regret in it.{/n} "The noble dynasty and all its branches have been found guilty of heresy. By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire house will be executed. The sentence is to be carried out immediately."
languages.original_text: {n}На лице Абеляра лежит тень, его голос тверд, однако в нем проскальзывают нотки сожаления.{/n} "Дворянское семейство и все его ветви обвиняется в ереси. Приказом Вольного Торговца весь род будет изничтожен. Исполнение приговора начать незамедлительно".

traits.locale_text: {n}A shadow lies on Abelard's face, his voice is firm, but not without a ring of regret to it.{/n} "The aristocratic house and all its branches are accused of heresy. By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire house will be executed. Begin the execution at once."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}A shadow lies on Abelard's face, his voice is firm, but not without a ring of regret to it.{/n} "The aristocratic house and all its branches are accused of heresy. By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire house will be executed. Begin the execution at once."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}A shadow is cast on Abelard's face, his tone is unwavering, but not without a ring of regret to it.{/n} "The aristocratic house and all of its branches are accused of heresy. By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire house will be executed. Begin the execution stat."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}A shadow is cast on Abelard's face, his tone is unwavering, but not without a ring of regret to it.{/n} "The aristocratic house and all of its branches are accused of heresy. By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire house will be executed. Begin the execution stat."

By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire house will be executed. The sentence is to be carried out immediately."

By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire house will be executed. The sentence is to be carried out immediately."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドの顔に影が差す。その口調は揺るぎないものではあるものの、その中に柔らかな後悔の響きが感じ取れる。{/n}「貴族の王朝とそのすべての分家は異端の罪で有罪となりました。ローグトレーダーの命により、一族は全員処刑されます。そして、刑は直ちに執行されます」
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow falls across Abelard's face. His tone is unwavering, but you hear the soft ring of regret in it.{/n} "The noble dynasty and all its branches have been found guilty of heresy. By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire house will be executed. The sentence is to be carried out immediately."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドの顔に影が差す。その口調は揺るぎないものではあるものの、その中に柔らかな後悔の響きが感じ取れる。{/n}「貴族の王朝とそのすべての分家は異端の罪で有罪となりました。ローグトレーダーの命により、一族は全員処刑されます。そして、刑は直ちに執行されます」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德的面容蒙上了一层阴影，尽管他毫不动摇地宣判了你的判决，但语气中却带着一丝遗憾。{/n}“该家族及其所有旁系皆犯下了异端罪行。奉行商浪人之命，所有人判处死刑，立即执行。”
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow falls across Abelard's face. His tone is unwavering, but you hear the soft ring of regret in it.{/n} "The noble dynasty and all its branches have been found guilty of heresy. By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire house will be executed. The sentence is to be carried out immediately."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德的面容蒙上了一层阴影，尽管他毫不动摇地宣判了你的判决，但语气中却带着一丝遗憾。{/n}“该家族及其所有旁系皆犯下了异端罪行。奉行商浪人之命，所有人判处死刑，立即执行。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Une ombre passe sur le visage d'Abélard tandis qu'il déclare, la voix assurée mais teintée de regret :{/n} « Cette noble dynastie et toutes ses branches ont été convaincues d'hérésie. Sur ordre {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, tous les membres de la famille sont condamnés à mort et la sentence va être exécutée sur-le-champ. »
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow falls across Abelard's face. His tone is unwavering, but you hear the soft ring of regret in it.{/n} "The noble dynasty and all its branches have been found guilty of heresy. By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire house will be executed. The sentence is to be carried out immediately."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une ombre passe sur le visage d'Abélard tandis qu'il déclare, la voix assurée mais teintée de regret :{/n} « Cette noble dynastie et toutes ses branches ont été convaincues d'hérésie. Sur ordre {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, tous les membres de la famille sont condamnés à mort et la sentence va être exécutée sur-le-champ. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}La cara de Abelard se ensombrece. Aunque su tono es firme, notas un leve tono de lamento en él.{/n} «La dinastía noble y todas sus ramas han sido declaradas culpables de herejía. Por orden de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, la casa entera será ejecutada. La sentencia se llevará a cabo de inmediato».
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow falls across Abelard's face. His tone is unwavering, but you hear the soft ring of regret in it.{/n} "The noble dynasty and all its branches have been found guilty of heresy. By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire house will be executed. The sentence is to be carried out immediately."

traits.locale_text: {n}La cara de Abelard se ensombrece. Aunque su tono es firme, notas un leve tono de lamento en él.{/n} «La dinastía noble y todas sus ramas han sido declaradas culpables de herejía. Por orden de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, la casa entera será ejecutada. La sentencia se llevará a cabo de inmediato».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein Schatten huscht über Abelards Gesicht. Sein Stimme ist fest, aber du erkennst einen Anflug von Bedauern darin. {/n} "Die noble Dynastie und alle ihre Nebenlinien wurden der Ketzerei für schuldig befunden. Auf Befehl {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wird das gesamte Haus hingerichtet. Die Strafe wird sofort vollzogen!"
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow falls across Abelard's face. His tone is unwavering, but you hear the soft ring of regret in it.{/n} "The noble dynasty and all its branches have been found guilty of heresy. By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire house will be executed. The sentence is to be carried out immediately."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Schatten legt sich auf Abelards Gesicht. Sein Ton ist fest, trägt aber eine Spur Reue in sich.{/n} "Dem aristokratischen Haus und allen seinen Zweigen wird Ketzerei vorgeworfen. Auf Befehl {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wird das gesamte Haus hingerichtet. Führt die Hinrichtung unverzüglich aus."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard'ın yüzü kararıyor. Ses tonunda en ufak titreme olmasa da kelimeleri söylerkenki pişmanlık hissini duyabiliyorsun.{/n} "Bu soylu hanedanlık ve tüm alt soyları, kâfirlikten suçlu bulunmuştur. Her bir hane mensubu, Hür Tacir'in emriyle idam edilecektir. Ceza tez elden infaz edilecektir."
languages.original_text: {n}A shadow falls across Abelard's face. His tone is unwavering, but you hear the soft ring of regret in it.{/n} "The noble dynasty and all its branches have been found guilty of heresy. By the order of the Rogue Trader, the entire house will be executed. The sentence is to be carried out immediately."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard'ın yüzü kararıyor. Ses tonunda en ufak titreme olmasa da yankılarında pişmanlık hissini duyabiliyorsun.{/n} "İşbu hanedanlık ve tüm alt soyları, kâfirlikten suçlu bulunmuştur. Hür Tacir'in emriyle hanenin tamamı idam edilecektir. Ceza tez elden infaz edilecektir."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
